messages.title: Fighting back against recession
messages.content: Britain was not prepared to let the global recession take its course and neither were we. We chose to fight back with bold action to protect jobs, homes and businesses. Our action ensured that the rates of unemployment, business failures and home repossessions are a lot lower than in the Tory recession of the 1990s.

messages.title: A future fair for families
messages.content: Strong families are the heart of strong communities. In government Labour has made it our priority to support families in work, in their homes and in giving their children the best start with 42,400 more teachers and the Working Tax Credit providing up to £300 per week for working parents.

messages.title: Protecting the NHS
messages.content: The NHS now has 89,000 more doctors than in 1997. Waiting lists are at their lowest level since records began. We guarantee quality of GP practices now offer extended opening hours.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll back businesses, support for families and continuing promoting jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting frontline services, protecting the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I'll back creating legally enforceable guarantees for all patients.
I will back fair chances at a good education with quality tuition for every child.
I'll back new guarantees on police response times and a firm but fair immigration system.
I'll back creating legally guarantees of a job or training place for 18-24 year olds.

issues.health: The NHS now has 89,000 more doctors than in 1997. Waiting lists are at their lowest level since records began. We guarantee quality of GP practices now offer extended opening hours.
issues.immigration: I'll back new guarantees on police response times and a firm but fair immigration system.

contactInformation.address: Tom Ross c/o 25 Stamford Avenue, Altrincham, WA14 4JH

endorsements.endorsement: I know Tom Ross cares about the same things as the people of Altrincham & Sale West - jobs, education, healthcare and preventing crime.

quotes.text: Britain was not prepared to let the global recession take its course and neither were we. We chose to fight back with bold action to protect jobs, homes and businesses. Our action ensured that the rates of unemployment, business failures and home repossessions are a lot lower than in the Tory recession of the 1990s.

images.caption: Tom at the Stamford Brook Development, which includes shared ownership housing - a Labour initiative
